Title: Program Notifications
Text:
This feature will notify you about program updates or important messages.

It is the only tool that connects, specifically to a GitHub-hosted JSON file.

The program connects only once when it starts, in order to retrieve the JSON file.

If, for any reason, you prefer not to use this feature, you can disable it in the settings. If you do so, the program will not connect online or attempt to do so. However, you will not receive notifications about program updates.

Title: New Update 7.5
Text:
𝐕 𝟕.𝟓
- Now the program will read all the .ini files in the main folder and all subfolders. (can be disabled in settings)
- A problem was found in some users, that if a mod had more than one .ini file, and you pressed the .ini open button, it did not open, or it did not open with the program selected in settings. Fixed
- Notes button, failed in some users, fixed
- Some users show horizontal scroll in the right menu, and mods window, some changes in the interface to prevent this scroll from appearing, (this scroll should not appear) if it continues to appear, send me a message.
- The settings interface has been redesigned.
- Optional, you can receive messages about new skins or skin updates created by tyrok (activate in settings in messages option)
- Other minor changes

Reminder: To update, just replace the files.

Click on the button to go directly to the download link
🔽🔽🔽🔽🔽🔽🔽🔽🔽🔽🔽🔽🔽🔽🔽🔽🔽🔽

Title: New Update 7.6
Text:
𝐕 𝟕.6
- Now keyviewer will also read the .ini of the subfolders. (The option to read subfolders of .ini files must be activated)
- In mod key names, the word "key" or "keyswap" may be omitted. You have to activate it in settings
- It has also been omitted to read Desktop.ini, for users who have this file

Reminder: To update, just replace the files.

Click on the button to go directly to the download link
